name: AnOn - BT - Surf anonymously On the GO
short_description:
Hi there ,
Anon - BT is a Project Made by XDrone For to Surf anonymously to 20 + Bit Torrent Sharing Websites.



1.Are you Worrying about your Neighbours seeing what you are downloading and uploading?
2.Are you Worrying about your Identity?
3.You Don't Want to tell anyone that you are downloading from BT Websites ?

and many more ?

Yes, this is the right Post you need to Before investing on any commercial servers/VPN's



Anon - BT will guard your Privacy while Surfing to Bit Torrent Sharing Websites.

How To Use AnOn - BT





1.Extract the AnOn - BT v.2.0.zip into a Folder using WinRar or Any.
2.Choose Your WebBrowser And Go to Appropriate Folder. 
3.copy the file "Config__v2.0.ANONBT"
4.Go to the Appropriate Browser Path And Paste the File "Config__v2.0.ANONBT"
5.Come back to the Release Folder and Choose your Browser Folder and Click on "Start AnOn - BT.bat"to Start the Protection!
6.Restart Browser!
7.Enjoy the Share!




~Some Noob Expected Que
